page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: The major part of the block is located in the{South-West part of Lincoln} comprising in the main{Birchwood and {Hartsholme}as well as part of the village of{Skellingthorpe}just outside the city boundary. This is an old village which has recently grown into a commuter settlement. The area known as{Birchwood}was a former airfield but is now the site of a very large housing estate which is still growing. The area is{flat}with large areas of open space,which includes{farmland, mainly arable,and a{countryside park} with lake. There is a large{sports {centre}attached to a High school.The site of Lincoln's{bypass}runs between Birchwood and Skellingthorpe.It is due to open in 1986. Hartsholme includes one of only 3{high-rise flats {in}Lincoln.
